@ada357345

Don't purchase that. It is a complete scam. All the information you need to safely softmod your Wii is in this torrent. Just use the method appropriate for your version of System Menu.

@aznadik

What you mentioned was not a new unit release, just a price drop. It it the same Wii that was more expensive before.
Will this work with 4.2U? copyright date on bottom of Wii says 2006. Got it for Xmas about a year later, finally got around to setting it up.
will this work on 4.2 e as my other homebrew stopped working

This packaged guide is growing a little redundant now. Visit this site for the latest, updated information:

http://sites.google.com/site/completesg/home

And just so people will stop asking, YES, this works on ANY WII and ANY SYSTEM MENU VERSION. Use the latest letterbomb method for best results on 4.3u, 4.3e or 4.3j

Note:

Ok, so I take back what I said, System Menu Version 1.0 is not supported. I would be amazed if anyone is still using that, however, if you are, just update your Wii manually or via a wireless connection. Also, not all Korean Wii Systems support soft-modding.
